TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProfilePropertyMetadata extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProfilePropertyMetadata extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.IExtensibleDataObject

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract]
[<System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract>]

summary.span: 提供描述配置文件属性的值的集合。

span.span: Provides a collection of values that describe a profile property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过类访问配置文件时，使用类检索有关配置文件属性的信息 。You use the class to retrieve information about a profile property when you access profiles through the class. 您可以检索属性的名称和类型，无论该属性是否为只读，是否可由未经身份验证的用户访问以及默认值。You can retrieve the name and type of the property, whether it is read-only, whether it can be accessed by users who have not been authenticated, and the default value. 应用程序可以根据这些值采取适当的操作，例如不尝试设置只读属性。An application can take the appropriate actions based on these values, such as not trying to set a read-only property. 若要 从与 Windows Communication Framework (WCF) 兼容的应用程序访问对象，请使用类的 方法 。To access the object from an application that is compatible with the Windows Communication Framework (WCF), use the method of the class. 用户不必登录即可检索 对象，因为配置文件属性的元数据不特定于用户的配置文件属性值。The user does not have to be logged on to retrieve the object because the metadata for profile properties is not specific to a user's profile property values. 当定义属性时，将在节的元素的 Web.config 文件中设置类中的值。The values in the class are set in the Web.config file in the element of the section when the property is defined.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示该属性是否可由未经身份验证的用户使用的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the property is available to unauthenticated users.

value.span: 如果该属性可由未经身份验证的用户使用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property is available to unauthenticated users; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用元素中的设置启用匿名标识时，可以设置匿名用户可以使用的配置文件属性。When you enable anonymous identification with settings in the element, you can set which profile properties are available to anonymous users. 定义属性时，可以在 Web.config 文件的节的元素中设置属性。You set the property in the element of the section of the Web.config file when the property is defined. 在客户端应用程序中，使用 属性来确定是否可以为匿名用户设置配置文件属性。From the client application, use the property to determine whether a profile property can be set for an anonymous user.

summary.span: 获取或设置该属性的默认值。

span.span: Gets or sets the default value of the property.

value.span: 如果在 Web.config 文件中定义了该属性的默认值，则为该默认值的序列化表示形式；否则为字符串“(null)”。

span.span: A serialized representation of the default value for the property, if a default value is defined in the Web.config file; otherwise the string "(null)".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的序列化格式由 类的属性确定 。The serialized format of the property is determined by the property of the class.
